Package dblp.social.hibernate

Interface Summary
ISodaHibernateSession Persistence providers have to provide an implementation of this interface.
 

Class Summary
SessionsPool This class implements a pool of SodaHibernateSessions.
SodaHibernateSessionFactory  
SodaHibernateSessionImpl This class wraps a Hibernate session and provides behaviour for making objects of Hibernate/ejb3-annotated classes persistent.
SodaModelProvider  
WorkArounds This class provides 3 workarounds to overcome some Hibernate mapping problems.
